title: NMEA Parser
description: NMEA Parser processes NMEA sentences from GPS
longDescription:
** Help & support on Discord: https://discord.gg/TE7RM5N **


NMEA Parser is an editor plugin that can be used to process NMEA sentences from a GPS or any positioning device.

It can be used to directly process data from a GPS in the Unreal Engine, for instance if you want to view a scene using the real coordinates of some objects. It can also be used to post-process GPS logs, for instance if you want to replay the movement of an object that has been recorded from a GPS.


More than the simple positioning NMEA sentences, the NMEA parser supports the following sentences: AAM, ALM, APB, BOD, BWC, GGA, GLL, GSA, GSV, HDT, RMB, RMC, RTE, VTG, WPL, XTE, ZDA.


More details on http://isaratech.com/portfolio/nmea-parser/
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • NMEA sentences parsing using blueprints
  • Support for AAM, ALM, APB, BOD, BWC, GGA, GLL, GSA, GSV, HDT, RMB, RMC, RTE, VTG, WPL, XTE, ZDA
  • Written entirely in C++
  • No external dependencies
  • Fully documented code, tutorials, and system documentation.

Code Modules:

  • NMEA Parser module


Number of Blueprints: 0

Number of C++ Classes: 21

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms: All platforms

Supported Target Build Platforms: All platforms

Documentation: https://docs.isaratech.com/ue4-plugins/nmea-parser

Website: http://isaratech.com/

Discord: https://discord.gg/TE7RM5N


Important/Additional Notes: Support for other sentences will be progressively added
